content:
I see this warning in a lot of QA reports for different IGs:History Page 'null' is wrong (ig.json#paths/history) - must be...
Is this something that can be fixed in the sample IG by setting up a correct default?
feel free to submit a PR on the sample IG for that
I will when I figure out how to fix it :slight_smile:

Thanks @Grahame Grieve. I'm using the template and the page you linked says using that file is deprecated when template-based approach is used. I can't find where I can control how ig.json is generated based on the template artifacts.
@Lloyd McKenzie that's a question for you
@Lloyd McKenzie any advice on how I can fix this?

@Mohammad Jafari you don't need to. The next release of the template will fix it for you. I'm just waiting on the next release of the IGPublisher that fixes a different issue and I'll move up the correction.
